definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The Amazon River apparently changed its mind a few times in history.
sentences.chinese: 亞馬孫河已經幾度改變自己的主意了。

sentences.english: Those women are far from being Amazon types.
sentences.chinese: 那些女人遠不像亞馬孫族般強悍剛勇。

sentences.english: In feminism he found an "amazonian" element.
sentences.chinese: 在女權主義，他找到了一位“亞馬孫”自供狀。

sentences.english: It has got the greatest river in the world, the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 它有世界上最大的河流亞馬孫河。

sentences.english: The future of the Amazon Basin is now a subject of fierce debate.
sentences.chinese: 今天，亞馬孫河流域的未來是一個熱烈爭論的話題。
巴西亞馬孫州檢察官若昂？

sentences.english: At its mouth it is 220 miles wide.
sentences.chinese: 亞馬孫河出海處寬約220英里。

sentences.english: Some hope to chart out that particular area of the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 有些榔學家希望對亞馬孫河賭那一藤定區域進行坎察。

sentences.english: Amazon River is the current capacity most river in the world.
sentences.chinese: 亞馬孫河是世界上流量最大的河。

sentences.english: At a later date the Amazons came to lay attack on Athens on the excuse of recovering their queen.
sentences.chinese: 後來，亞馬孫族人藉口要奪回王后派兵攻打雅典。

sentences.english: This is a small community living on the upper reaches of the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 這是居住在亞馬孫河上游的一個小社區。

sentences.english: My books from Amazon.com will arrive very soon.
sentences.chinese: 我從亞馬孫網站上訂的書很快就會到了。
